data.title: Good food and atmosphere let down by forgotten order
data.text:
Broad selection of sushi,sashimi, fish, beef. What we ordered was well presented, tasty and the sushi was good value but the service was slow (not that we really minded but others who might want a faster in-out might be disappointed).

Great friendly welcome by the guy dressed as spiderman on the front desk (it was halloween Saturday after all) and the evening ended up with a live band who played well and created a good atmosphere.

There were 3 of us, 3 meals were ordered but only 2 were delivered ! Rather than make too much of a fuss we split the ample meals between the 2 adults (whose food arrived) and my friends daughter (whose food did not arrive).

Wonderful location to watch the sun go down and many people seemed to enjoy the vibe.

data.title: Hidden Newport gem
data.text: A bit off the beaten path located on Bayside drive near Balboa island.  Great food and good wine choices.  Would go more often but it's just not a location I think of like PCH.  It's great when we see concerts at the Hyatt in summer, great food and they have a free shuttle to avoid parking hassles.
